jcr:content.awardName3: The Mary Dean Brewer Gold Award Scholarship
jcr:content.awardReq1: Registered member of Girl Scouts for at least one continuous year Description of individual growth through Girl Scout experiences Leadership awards and accomplishments Expressed financial need Accepted to an institution of higher education
jcr:content.awardReq2: Registered member of Girl Scouts for at least one continuous year Graduating senior with at least 5 years Girl Scout experience Girl Scout Silver or Gold Award (an all requested documentation) Overall GPA of at least 3.0 on a 4.0 scale in high school
jcr:content.awardReq3: Registered member of Girl Scouts at time of initial application and maintain continued adult Girl Scout membership throughout scholarship period Girl Scout Gold Award (and all requested documentation) Overall GPA of at least 3.5 on a 4.0 scale in high school
jcr:content.sponsor: Girl Scouts of Eastern South Carolina
